ai-mil6.2.10:1.1_0: “Venerable sir, why do you think the sun shines?”
ai-mil6.2.10:1.2_0: “Great king, you ignoring conventions. Your skin was resplendently unwelled by the wind, very strong wind, and sun. All these non-humans are seen by the rays of the sun and resplendent, and all those non-humans.
ai-mil6.2.10:2.1_0: On the contrary, though it’s winter, it’s nearly a great earthquake. When the sun has dyeed up and warted, trimmming and huge, and there is a storm-inking. It’s carrpets for the storms, trembling, clear, and unclouded by the sun.
ai-mil6.2.10:2.2_0: And here is the reason why that’s the lower sun shines when going.”
ai-mil6.2.10:2.3_0: “Sir, weighing rapture in the sun, the waist cart does not grab a monkey in the corner of heat.”
ai-mil6.2.10:4.1_0: The second sub-chapter on non-proliferation is finished.
ai-mil6.2.10:5.1_0: (In this way) he spoke the ten questions in accordance with the Teaching.
